The Crutch Pack has a roomy main zippered compartment large enough for a wallet, checkbook, comb/brush, medicine, etc. -- even an occasional sandwich. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; It may also be attached to the side of some power chairs (hangs toward the front of the armrest, partially on the armrest and partially on the metal tubing by the knee) and to the tiller of some scooters (ones that have tubing on which to attach the pack). &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Composed of a durable, specially weighted rubber compound, great care was taken to control the right amount of flexibility, giving the base its remarkable performance.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Stairs are now easily managed. Quad canes need to be turned sideways on stairs, making the user uncomfortable and in some cases fearful. The &lt;b&gt;AbleTripod®&lt;/b&gt; gives the user confidence to negotiate even the narrowest steps. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The stress of impact on the user's hand is greatly reduced by the &lt;b&gt;AbleTripod® Base&lt;/b&gt;, which flexes as you walk. The tips of the pods flex, grabbing while permitting the AbleTripod® to roll through, maintaining contact with the ground. The stability of the AbleTripod® base is not compromised whether on grass, gravel or sand , whereas typical canes may sink into the ground. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The &lt;b&gt;AbleTripod® Walking Cane Tip&lt;/b&gt; can be used in ways that no other cane can: its unique design enables the user to lean into the cane, experiencing both support and balance. The ability to lateralize gives the user a unique feeling of confidence, knowing that the AbleTripod® is less likely to slip out than quad canes. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The patented &lt;b&gt;AbleTripod® Base&lt;/b&gt; easily replaces your walking cane tip, addressing all of these issues and more. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The base comes in 4 standard-size openings: 5/8", 3/4", 7/8", 1" and 11/16" &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; &lt;b&gt;**See Diagram above for proper fit.**&lt;/b&gt; Offset Door Hinges are also known as Swing Clear Hinges as they will actually swing your door clear of the door frame making it easier to get a wheelchair or walker through the doorway. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Rather than cutting a larger frame and installing a bigger door, Offset Hinges are cost effective and can be retro-fitted to handle most residential doors. Waterproof nylon top reduces friction and allows a person to smoothly turn and get into or out of a car. Non-slip surface on the bottom of the Car Slide keeps it in place on the seat. The &lt;b&gt;Car Seat Slide&lt;/b&gt; can also be used by a caregiver to move or reposition patients on chairs and beds. Generously sized hand loops on the edges made of strong 1 inch webbing.&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt;        &lt;P STYLE="margin-left: 5px; margin-right: 30px"&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"&gt;                &lt;h4&gt;Car Seat Slide - Discontinued Specifications:&lt;/h4&gt;        &lt;/FONT&gt;        &lt;/P&gt;        &lt;TABLE CELLSPACING="2" CELLPADDING="2" BORDER="0"&gt;                &lt;TR VALIGN="TOP"&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;IMG WIDTH="14" SRC="/assets/uploaded/spacer.gif" HEIGHT="12" BORDER="0"&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;&lt;B&gt;Hand loops:&lt;/B&gt;&lt;/FONT&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;I inch webbed nylon&lt;/FONT&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;        &lt;/TR&gt;                &lt;/TABLE&gt;</ExtendedDescription><Keywords>Car Seat Slide, car slide, help position in car, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired</Keywords><RelatedProducts><Product><ProductID>CMT5</ProductID><ProductName>SafetySure Transfer Board</ProductName></Product><Product><ProductID>AST415</ProductID><ProductName>Car Caddie</ProductName></Product></RelatedProducts><ShipCost>0.00</ShipCost><Title>Car Seat Slide - Discontinued</Title><MetaTags>&lt;META name="keywords" CONTENT="Car Seat Slide, car slide, help position in car, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired "&gt;&lt;META name="description" CONTENT="The Car Seat Slide  helps individuals who have difficulty getting positioned on a car seat. The use of this material makes them extremely durable and provides for an excellent grip both indoors and outdoors. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Safety is enhanced because the tread pattern at the bottom of the tip does not wear as quickly as a conventional tip. Inside the tip is a rust proof metal washer made of zinc plated steel which prevents the cane or crutch from wearing through the tip. The "tire track" treads at the point of contact provide an excellent grip on most surfaces. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The convex bottom enhances both walking comfort and durability. This cane tip has a patented elastic neck which adjusts to the dimension of the cane or crutch shaft, making it easy for the user to replace tips as needed. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt; Designed and manufactured in Sweden, the cane or crutch tip is made of high quality polyurethane and provides an excellent grip both indoors and outdoors. The retractable spike is made of stainless steel and will not rust.   The tread pattern at the bottom of the tip does not wear as quickly as a conventional can or crutch tips. Designed to reduce the friction and help prevent the incidence of skin breakdown. Especially useful for individuals who utilize crutches for longer periods. Made of a resilient gel formula that retains its shape and effectiveness over time. Gel Crutch Mate Hand Pads provide long lasting comfort. They can be wiped down with a damp cloth and mild soap or disinfectant.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The hand grips are completely round and slide on. To install, simply remove the old hand grip core from the crutch, and slip off the original foam pad. Next, push the core through the Crutch-Mate Hand Grip Crutch Pad and re-assemble the crutch. Latex free hand grip pads are a great alternative for latex sensitive users. This transfer pole and grab bar provides a secure support for standing or for transferring a patient to a walker, wheelchair or other mobility device. Because wall mounts are not needed, this transfer aid can be moved to any room in your home whenever necessary. The slim design is ideal for transfers in tight spaces. It can be installed between the bathtub and the toilet, placed at your bedside, or conveniently, next to a sofa or chair. The main pole has rubber pads on the top and bottom protect the ceiling and floor and easily separates into two 53 inch pieces making it easy to transport. Includes wrench and no other tools are required for assembly. Fits ceiling heights 7 - 10 ft. <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6461</CatalogID><ProductID>AST415</ProductID><ProductName>Car Caddie</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3385</CategoryID><CategoryName>Car Transfer Aids</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>15.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>0.00</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>10</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>8/23/2011</DateCreated><Description>Offers you a helping hand getting in or out of a car.</Description><ExtendedDescription>The &lt;b&gt;Car Caddie&lt;/b&gt; is a car transfer aid designed for use by individuals with mobility disabilities. This unique product offers you a helping hand getting in or out of a car, van, or truck. This figure-eight style aid is constructed of nylon, loops around the car door window frame and adjusts for varying heights of vehicle windows, to meet your needs. The cushioned grip provides security and assistance while entering and exiting the automobile. Just pull on the comfortable cushion grip when you need assistance getting in or out of your vehicle. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; You can carry it with you to use in other vehicles because it has an adjustable strap and does not need to be permanently installed. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The CarCaddie is intended to act as a means for balance and support. It is not intended to carry the full weight of an individual. Maximum weight bearing capacity is 250 pounds. &lt;BR&gt;&lt;BR&gt;To install the Car Caddie in your vehicle, simply roll the window down enough to loop the Car Caddie around the top frame of the window. Then snap the buckle closed and adjust the length so you can reach the handle while seated. Position the Car Caddie along the frame in the most effective position that provides you maximum assistance. Roll the window up to secure the Car Caddie in place. &lt;p&gt;&lt;h4&gt;Car Caddie Specifications:&lt;/h4&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;Nylon construction.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Cushioned handle.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Strap length adjusts from 7 to 16 inches.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Handle grip measures 5 inches.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Universal fit for any framed car window.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;</ExtendedDescription><Keywords>car caddie, help getting in, out car, truck, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired</Keywords><RelatedProducts><Product><ProductID>CMT96314</ProductID><ProductName>Auto Handy Bar Transfer Aid</ProductName></Product><Product><ProductID>CPO6551</ProductID><ProductName>Posey Transport Belt</ProductName></Product></RelatedProducts><ShipCost>0.00</ShipCost><Title>Car Caddie :: car standing aid</Title><MetaTags>&lt;META name="keywords" CONTENT="car caddie, help getting in, out car, truck, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired "&gt;&lt;META name="description" CONTENT="Offers you a helping hand getting in or out of a car, van, or truck. The rail is 17 inches wide, offering ample surface space to grab onto. You can store small items in the included Bed Rail organizer so that they are within reach. If you don't need it all the time, the Bed Rail Advantage folds down flat for easy storage in a closet or under the bed. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Quality steel construction - heavy duty steel with powder coat providing long lasting quality. Portable handle folds down for storage and portability.  Safety strap secures base to mattress. Foam Grip provides comfortable cushion grip; closed cell foam is easy to sanitize. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Bed Rail Advantage requires no assembly. Simply slide the base between the box spring and mattress of any sized bed and secure the safety strap to the other side of the bed frame. The bed rail can be placed on either the left or right side of the bed and will accommodate deeper mattresses. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Ships via UPS Ground. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; &lt;center&gt;&lt;object width="425" height="344"&gt;&lt;param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/igGF42LwjQQ&amp;hl=en&amp;fs=1&amp;rel=0"&gt;&lt;/param&gt;&lt;param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"&gt;&lt;/param&gt;&lt;param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"&gt;&lt;/param&gt;&lt;embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/igGF42LwjQQ&amp;hl=en&amp;fs=1&amp;rel=0" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="425" height="344"&gt;&lt;/embed&gt;&lt;/object&gt;&lt;/center&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a href="/assets/images/pdf/ast422-bedrail-advantage-instructions.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;Standers Bed Rail Advantage Instructions&lt;/a&gt;&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt; Can be used on products, such as arm pads, foot plates, head rests, leg rests, and splints or braces.  Adaptive Pads are available in 1/4 inch 1/2 inch and 5/8 inch thicknesses.  The Adaptive Pad when used as a cushion is intended for comfort only, not medical intervention. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; AKTON polymer won't leak, flow, or bottom out, and it is tissue equivalent. It moves with wheelchair users, not against them, to reduce pressure and shear, the two leading causes of pressure sores. AKTON polymer is also radiolucent and easy to clean with standard disinfectant. It will not support microbiological growth, and it won't absorb body fluids or odors. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Please note:  If 1/2 inch or 5/8 inch pad is used for a seating cushion, pad must be used with an Action brand cover for warranty to be in force. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Choose from the following models: &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;Adaptive Pad 16 x 16 x 1/2 inch #CAC5302&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Adaptive Pad 18 x 16 x 1/2 inch #CAC5303&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Adaptive Pad 18 x 18 x 1/2 inch #CAC541818&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;Adaptive Pad 20 x 20 x 1/2 inch #CAC6500&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt; Choose Optional Basic Cover, or no cover option. AKTON polymer won't leak, flow, or bottom out, and it is tissue equivalent. It moves with wheelchair users, not against them, to reduce pressure and shear, the two leading causes of pressure sores. AKTON polymer is also radiolucent and easy to clean with standard disinfectant. It will not support microbiological growth, and it won't absorb body fluids or odors. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;  &lt;b&gt;Adaptive Cube Pads&lt;/b&gt; have multifunctional applications for traditional and non-traditional seating challenges. Pads are designed to be cut and used for spot protection in products such as arm pads, foot plates, head/leg rests and splints/braces. The Adaptive Cube Pad can be adapted for use on backs to support and reduce risk to bony prominence, on gel-based cushions to stop bottoming out, and on existing low-end cushions to provide increased shear and pressure reduction. The cubical design of the pad surface allows increased air circulation, cushioning from mild impact, heat dissipation and increased comfort. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Adaptive Cube Pad is available in 9/16 inch thickness.  The Adaptive Cube Pad is not sold with a cover.  If a cover is desired, please order a Shear Smart Pad.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Shipping via UPS Ground. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; This is a non-returnable hygiene item.&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt; Drivers and passengers that utilize the handicap parking spaces are required to have the state issued handicap permit visible when parking in designated spaces.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Handi-Card handicap permit card storage and display makes it convenient for the handicapped person to comply with displaying the permit. It makes it easy to store the permit and then display it from the same location; just pull the sun visor down. The handicapped parking permit which has been stored is now ready to swivel into display position. When no longer in use, it swivels back into rest position, as the sun visor is returned to original position.  Soft gray color complements most any vehicle interior. Holder measures 12 inches long and 6 1/2 inches wide. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Handi-Card also improves safety. With the BeasyTrans Systems, most users can achieve regular access to an automobile. For some, this may mean a greater quality of life. The visiting of friends and relatives may be resumed. Educational and cultural undertakings can be attended. The systems may even allow the user to live at home while receiving outpatient care, rather than living in a long term facility and even for travelling! &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; It's a well documented fact: lifting leads to injury. For example, patient movement tasks statistically place nursing personnel in the top percentile of the U.S. labor force for back injuries. At the same time, the person being lifted is at risk for arm and brachial plexus type injuries as well as back injuries from being torqued or twisted. The risk of such injuries is tremendously reduced when lifting is eliminated. The frictionless, lateral slide is clearly the state of the art in patient transfer. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The design of the BeasyTrans Easy Transfer boards make it possible to apply sliding technology to a wide range of transfer and therapeutic functions in both the clinical and homecare environment.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6488</CatalogID><ProductID>CDCB2111</ProductID><ProductName>Standard Saddle Armrest Bag</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3364</CategoryID><CategoryName>Scooter Accessories</CategoryName></Category><Category><CategoryID>3379</CategoryID><CategoryName>Wheelchair Packs, Bags &amp; Totes</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>19.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>0.00</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>6</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>8/23/2011</DateCreated><Description>Large single pocket bag that mounts to most any armrest.</Description><ExtendedDescription>The &lt;b&gt;Standard Saddle Armrest Bag&lt;/b&gt; is a large single pocket bag that mounts to most any wheelchair or scooter armrest.  Ideal for keeping personal belongings close.  The saddle bag straps over your scooter or wheelchair armrest to provide a handy storage area for keys, wallet, phone, glasses, or other personal items. Attaches to most armrests using unique "soft to the skin" mounting system. To attach, wrap the fabric with the soft hook material over the top of the armrest and secure it to the loop strap. The soft material allows your arm to move over the armrest without discomfort or skin irritation. Use the smaller hook and loop strap attached to the bottom of the bag to secure it to the seat post or frame and prevent the bag from swinging. This armrest bag can be mounted on inside or outside of armrest.  Fits armrests from 1 inch round tubing to deluxe scooter armrests. Measures 10 inches wide x 8 inches long x 3 inches deep.  &lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt;        &lt;P STYLE="margin-left: 5px; margin-right: 30px"&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"&gt;                &lt;h4&gt;Standard Saddle Armrest Bag Specifications:&lt;/h4&gt;        &lt;/FONT&gt;        &lt;/P&gt;        &lt;TABLE CELLSPACING="2" CELLPADDING="2" BORDER="0"&gt;                &lt;TR VALIGN="TOP"&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;IMG WIDTH="14" src="/assets/uploaded/spacer.gif" HEIGHT="12" BORDER="0"&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;&lt;B&gt;Measures:&lt;/B&gt;&lt;/FONT&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;10 inches wide x 8 inches long x 3 inches deep.&lt;/FONT&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;        &lt;/TR&gt;                &lt;/TABLE&gt;</ExtendedDescription><Keywords>scooter armrest bag, arm rest bag, scooter arm rest bag, armrest bags for wheelchairs, saddle bag, mobility aids, elderly, seniors, physically impaired, handicapped, disabled, wheelchair armrest saddle bag</Keywords><RelatedProducts><Product><ProductID>CFP181</ProductID><ProductName>Folding Wheelchair Cup Holder</ProductName></Product><Product><ProductID>CDCF1100</ProductID><ProductName>Folding Wheelchair Safety Flag</ProductName></Product></RelatedProducts><ShipCost>0.00</ShipCost><Title>Standard Saddle Armrest Scooter Bag</Title><MetaTags>&lt;META name="keywords" CONTENT="standard saddle bag, scooter armrest bag, arm rest bag, scooter arm rest bag, armrest bags for wheelchairs, saddle bag, mobility aids, elderly, seniors, physically impaired, handicapped, disabled, wheelchair armrest saddle bag"&gt;&lt;META name="description" CONTENT="Standard Saddle Armrest Bag is a large single pocket bag that mounts to most any armrest. <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6531</CatalogID><ProductID>CMI704171</ProductID><ProductName>Leg Loop Leg Lift</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3387</CategoryID><CategoryName>Leg Lifters</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>11.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>9.95</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>28</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>8/23/2011</DateCreated><Description>Foot loop stays conformed to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable grip.</Description><ExtendedDescription>The &lt;b&gt;Leg Loop Leg Lift&lt;/b&gt; allows a person to safely and effectively reposition the leg and foot onto a footrest, a bed, into a car, etc. by providing a more secure grip than merely tugging on a piece of clothing.  The Leg Loop consists of two loops - a hand loop and a foot loop, one at each end of a rigid middle section. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Leg Loop Leg Lift helps people with limited lower extremity strength lift the leg and foot. It is designed to help people who have medical conditions in which they either partially or completely lose the ability to independently move their leg. Paraplegia, hemiplegia, paraparesis, hip surgery, and knee surgery are fairly common examples. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The foot loop stays open until the strap is pulled and then conforms to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable grip. Rigid middle section allows for easy maneuverability. Once pulled, the loop closes and conforms to the shape of the foot for a secure and comfortable fit.  This, combined with the rigid middle section" he asserts "makes it easier to place on the foot than other leg lifts and reduces the risk of the foot falling out and becoming injured. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6534</CatalogID><ProductID>CMI70622</ProductID><ProductName>Drink Holder</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3362</CategoryID><CategoryName>Wheelchair Accessories</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>9.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>0.00</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>1</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>8/23/2011</DateCreated><Description>Holds a drink securely on wheelchair frame, bed rails or other tubular frames.</Description><ExtendedDescription>&lt;b&gt;Wheelchair Drink Holder &lt;/b&gt; holds a drink securely on wheelchair frame, bed rails or other tubular frames. This wheelchair cup holder is made of tough plastic and is slotted on two sides to hold one or two handled cups and mugs. The plastic clamp has a large easy-to-tighten lever knob and can be positioned to the outside, inside, or front of the wheelchair. The mounting clamp fits a 1 inch diameter tube and comes with a sleeve to reduce it to fit 7/8 inch tube frames. This wheelchair cup holder will accommodate beverage containers 2 1/2 to 3 inches in diameter, including bottle, cans, glasses, mugs, and cups. <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6544</CatalogID><ProductID>CMT508</ProductID><ProductName>SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3365</CategoryID><CategoryName>Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids</CategoryName></Category><Category><CategoryID>3385</CategoryID><CategoryName>Car Transfer Aids</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>69.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>0.00</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>10</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>8/23/2011</DateCreated><Description>Designed for use by people who are able to stand but cannot readily move their legs.</Description><ExtendedDescription>The &lt;b&gt;SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc&lt;/b&gt; is designed for use by patients who are able to stand but cannot readily move their legs. For maximum support and safety for both the patient and the helper, we recommend that either a transfer belt or sling be used in conjunction with the Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; An individual with impaired mobility from paralysis or limited upper body functions can use the Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc unassisted in a very efficient way. If the patient cannot use his/her upper extremities a helper will be needed. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc is placed on the floor with the label facing downwards. The patient's feet are to be positioned completely on the disc to facilitate a smooth transfer and reduce back strain on both patient and helper. The handle of the Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc should be placed facing the patient, to prevent interfering with the feet of the helper. The helper should place one of his/her feet on the disc to safely monitor and control the transfer. After using the Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc, it should immediately be removed from the floor to avoid accidents. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Because of the lightweight and convenient grip handle, the SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc is easy to use and carry. The Safety Sure Transfer Pivot Disc is made of three high quality polymer plates, one turning on top of the other. The SafetySure Transfer Pivot Disc is also equipped with anti-glide tape on both sides to prevent slipping on the floor or when a patient is standing on the disc. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; &lt;b&gt;Transfer between a chair and a wheelchair:&lt;/b&gt; The disc is "locked" in place when the helper places his/her heel comfortably on the floor and the rest of his/her foot firmly on the plate between the feet of the patient. The patient wears a transfer belt and the helper holds on to the handles while guiding the patient through the transfer. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; &lt;b&gt;Transfer between a wheelchair and a toilet:&lt;/b&gt; Proper use of the disc in this situation is identical to above, except it is safer and easier with two helpers. The helper(s) can use their other, free hand(s) to help undress the patient before placing him/her on the toilet. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; &lt;b&gt;Transfer between a wheelchair and a bed:&lt;/b&gt; Before you move a patient from a bed to a wheelchair, you should make sure that the wheelchair is positioned as close to the bed as possible, with the wheels locked. (For better control and safety, always have the patient wear a transfer belt. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Safety Sure Transfer Disc is available in 3 sizes, weighs 2 pounds and is 1/2 inch thick. &lt;br&gt; CMT5081 13 inch diameter&lt;br&gt; CMT5082 15 inch diameter&lt;br&gt; CMT5083 18 inch diameter &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Weight limit 300 lbs.&lt;br&gt;&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt;        &lt;P STYLE="margin-left: 5px; The Mary's Aide transfer sling is made of woven nylon with hook and loop closures. Shaped like and undergarment, it is worn over the patient's clothing. In addition, the Auto Handy Bar Transfer Aid is easy to insert and remove, it is strong, durable and affordable. The material is forged steel with corrosion resistant plating. At just 0.7 lb., and measuring approx. 9 in. long, the Handybar is sufficiently lightweight, and compact, for it to be carried around in a handbag or pack.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The precisely shaped nose locks the Handybar securely into position with little effort and enables it to be removed just as easily. It is also cranked, or bent, over its length to enable it to be reversed to give just the right height and angle of grip for getting in and out of a vehicle. Smaller, more compact cars tend to be lower down, closer to the ground making it even more difficult to get in and out of them. Fortunately, the U-type striker plate is one of the most rugged components in a vehicle being designed to keep the door closed in the event of a side-impact crash. There is a striker on each of the door pillars enabling the Handybar to be used by both the driver and passengers. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Handy Bar also includes a seat belt cutter and side window breaker. Weight limit 350 lbs. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Winner of Best New Product, Medtrade West April 2001 Prescribed by Doctors &amp; Recommended by Health professionals Fits over 170 million vehicles in North America.&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt; The "J" hook design fastens safely and securely to the neck of your rear-view mirror. That area is not even visible from the drivers seat, and it is the main reason why parking tags often tear during the process.  Simply hang your placard on this handy hanger and go, its that easy! &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Invented by a handicapped permit owner who became very frustrated every time he tried to hang his parking tag from the mirror, this ingenious product has made life a lot easier for many people.  The mirror arm that handicap parking tags hang from cannot be seen from the drivers seat. That means you have to lean forward, crank your head and neck and basically twist your body into positions it was never designed to be in just so you can see where to hang your tag.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;It is considered a traffic violation if you drive with your handicap placard still on display almost everywhere in the US and across Canada. According to the law, a moving vehicle that has a parking permit hanging from the mirror is technically obstructing the driver's view of the road. The Placard Hanger promotes safe driving habits, provides unrestricted visibility while in your vehicle, and makes it easy to remove your handicap placard before putting your automobile in gear.&lt;p&gt;&lt;h4&gt;Handicapped Placard Hanger Specifications:&lt;/h4&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;J shaped hook design.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Constructed of special 11-gauge aluminum wire.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;Easily hangs a handicap placard for display.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;&lt;/p&gt;</ExtendedDescription><Keywords>handicapped placard hanger, handicap placcard hanger, handicap permit hanger, handicapped permit display, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker, gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired</Keywords><RelatedProducts><Product><ProductID>APT400</ProductID><ProductName>Accu-Grips™ :: Wheelchair Grips</ProductName></Product><Product><ProductID>CACCU</ProductID><ProductName>Akton Polymer Adaptive Cube Pad</ProductName></Product></RelatedProducts><ShipCost>0.00</ShipCost><Title>Handicapped Placard Hanger</Title><MetaTags>&lt;META name="keywords" CONTENT="handicapped placard hanger, handicap placcard hanger, handicap permit hanger, handicapped permit display, mobility aids, wheelchair, walker, gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired"&gt;&lt;META name="description" CONTENT="The Handicap Placard Hanger display fastens safely and securely to the neck of your rear-view mirror. <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6569</CatalogID><ProductID>CSG5959</ProductID><ProductName>Wireless Wander Door Alarm</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3368</CategoryID><CategoryName>Safety Alarms</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>44.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>0.00</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>13</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>8/23/2011</DateCreated><Description>Alerts caregivers or staff when a family member, resident or patient attempts to leave a room or window, or wanders into an unsupervised area.</Description><ExtendedDescription>The &lt;b&gt;Wireless Wander Door Alarm&lt;/b&gt; alerts caregivers or staff when a family member, resident or patient attempts to leave a room or window, or wanders into an unsupervised area. This wireless alarm system has a door or window sensor which attaches easily to a door and doorjamb or to a window and window frame. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; This two-part alarm system has a door sensor mounted in the resident's room and a wireless receiver/alarm carried by the caregiver. The receiver will alert you with a beep or vibrate. The door sensor attaches easily to both sides of the doorjamb. When the door or window is opened, the electronic signal is sent to the remote receiver. The signal alerts the caregiver that the resident is either wandering out of safe range or entering a non-supervised area. Excellent for home use - offers caregivers the peace of mind and freedom to attend other duties. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; System includes a battery in the sending unit and mounting instructions.&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt; The center override lever makes backing up unoccupied wheelchair easy, or opt to remove lever without effecting operation of anti-rollback device. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; &lt;b&gt;How it works:&lt;/b&gt; The Anti-Rollback System attaches to the rear of most sling seat wheelchairs. A lever directly contacts the underside of the seat and is mechanically linked to the brake arms. If the patient begins to stand, the brake arms clamp down on the wheels, preventing the chair from rolling backwards. When the patient is seated, the brake arms automatically unlock, and the chair can continue to roll freely. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Safe-t-mate Anti-Rollback device for wheelchairs is available with an optional battery-powered integrated alarm that sounds when anti-rollback device is engaged. This alarm will alert facility staff of clients movement. An adapter kit for heavy seat cushions is also available. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Safe-t-mate Wheelchair Anti Rollback Device is easy to install and fits most wheelchairs. &lt;ul&gt; &lt;li&gt;CSM22S Standard model fits 16 - 20 inch wide wheelchairs&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;CSM22W Wide model fits 22 - 24 inch extra wide wheelchairs&lt;/li&gt; &lt;li&gt;CSM22A Standard model with Alarm fits 16 - 20 inch wheelchairs and includes the integrated alarm&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;CSM22WA Wide model with Alarm fits 22 - 24 inch wide wheelchairs and includes the integrated alarm&lt;/li&gt; &lt;/ul&gt;</ExtendedDescription><Keywords>safe t mate wheelchair anti rollback device, wheelchair anti rollback device, wheelchair anti roll device, mobility aids, products, supplies, wheelchair, walker, gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired</Keywords><RelatedProducts><Product><ProductID>CSM011</ProductID><ProductName>Wheelchair Front Anti Tippers</ProductName></Product><Product><ProductID>CSM008</ProductID><ProductName>Wheelchair Rear Anti Tippers</ProductName></Product></RelatedProducts><ShipCost>0.00</ShipCost><Title>Anti Rollback Device for Wheelchairs</Title><MetaTags>&lt;META name="keywords" CONTENT="safe t mate wheelchair anti rollback device, wheelchair anti rollback device, wheelchair anti roll device, mobility aids, products, supplies, wheelchair, walker, gear, accessories, for the elderly, seniors, disabled, handicapped, physically impaired"&gt;&lt;META name="description" CONTENT="The Safe T Mate Wheelchair Anti Rollback Device prevents a wheelchair from rolling backward by grabbing the tires as the user attempts to sit or stand. These lightweight footpads are highly visible, making them easy for you to see where the legs of the walker are to avoid tripping or stumbling. Made of a special polymer blend, durable plastic that easily glides in all directions over concrete, carpets and linoleum floors with very little effort.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The unique design of these replacement walker footpads includes an O-ring to securely attach the Walker Coasters without tools. Unlike walker balls and tennis balls, Walker Coasters do not absorb water or collect debris.&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt;        &lt;P STYLE="margin-left: 5px; margin-right: 30px"&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"&gt; The Signature Series Suitcase Ramps feature an extruded non-skid tread for superior traction, and a self-adjusting bottom transition plate for easy conversion from ramp to ground. The hinge features a no-pinch, non-protruding live hinge for safe, silent, and maintenance free operation. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The ergonomically designed flexible, non-breakable handles offer convenient carrying and a comfortable grip. The 800 lb weight capacity allows the ramp to safely support power scooters, power wheelchairs and manual wheelchairs. The Signature Series Suitcase Ramps feature an extruded non-skid tread for superior traction, and a self-adjusting bottom transition plate for easy conversion from ramp to ground. The hinge features a no-pinch, non-protruding live hinge for safe, silent, and maintenance free operation. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The ergonomically designed flexible, non-breakable handles offer convenient carrying and a comfortable grip. The 800 lb weight capacity allows the ramp to safely support power scooters, power wheelchairs and manual wheelchairs. The patented, hands-free, automatic illumination is the only personal visual aid that knows when to turn itself on and off. By providing illumination the Mobility Light increases patient/user safety. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The Safety Mobility Light provides hands free illumination from 3 super-bright LED lights. Three bright LED lights are powered by two AAA batteries (included). The light uses two sensors. Only when it is in a low light environment and in use will the light illuminate. Inside is open cell foam and a polyurethane solid GEL. It is referred to as a SOLID GEL and will not leak out. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Gel Ovations  products incorporate a latex-free, solid GEL and have a durable neoprene nylon surface, which is soft, easy to clean, and highly efficient at distributing pressure. They protect bony prominences and reduce abrasions, shear, and harmful pressure-related problems. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Pair of GEL and Foam Crutch Top Covers stretch to fit the top of all standard crutches. Installed over the existing foam crutch pads and secured with Velcro®. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Do NOT put pads/covers in a washing machine.&lt;br&gt; Do NOT submerge them in water or agitate.&lt;br&gt; Do NOT put in clothes dryer. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; With HEATED DRYING turned OFF, you may wash them in the top rack of an automatic dishwasher. Alternatively, wipe the surface with any normal household soap or cleaning solution that is not irritating and to which you are not allergic.&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt;        &lt;P STYLE="margin-left: 5px; The Gel Crutch Handle Covers attach right on top of the existing foam or rubber hand grips with Velcro. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The cover is a chloroprene rubber with a nylon surface, similar to wet suit material. Inside is open cell foam and a polyurethane solid GEL. It is referred to as a SOLID GEL and will not leak out. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Gel Ovations  products incorporate a latex-free, solid GEL and have a durable neoprene nylon surface, which is soft, easy to clean, and highly efficient at distributing pressure. They protect bony prominences and reduce abrasions, shear, and harmful pressure-related problems. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Do NOT put pads/covers in a washing machine.&lt;br&gt; Do NOT submerge them in water or agitate.&lt;br&gt; Do NOT put in clothes dryer. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; With HEATED DRYING turned OFF, you may wash them in the top rack of an automatic dishwasher. They fit over the side tubes of all brands of traditional walkers. The pads are OPEN at both ends and are applied over the existing hand grips. These are for walkers that have a mostly straight circular grip like found on bicycles and U shaped walkers. Regardless of the covering on the hand grip - they Velcro® over the existing grip. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; These covers are NOT for use on walkers (rollators) with the wide and unusually shaped orthotic grips. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The cover is a chloroprene rubber with a nylon surface, similar to wet suit material. Inside is open cell foam and a polyurethane solid GEL. It is referred to as a SOLID GEL and will not leak out. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Gel Ovations  products incorporate a latex-free, solid GEL and have a durable neoprene nylon surface, which is soft, easy to clean, and highly efficient at distributing pressure. They protect bony prominences and reduce abrasions, shear, and harmful pressure-related problems. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Do NOT put pads/covers in a washing machine.&lt;br&gt; Do NOT submerge them in water or agitate.&lt;br&gt; Do NOT put in clothes dryer. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; With HEATED DRYING turned OFF, you may wash them in the top rack of an automatic dishwasher. These zip on - over the open end of the grip and on top of the existing handle. The GEL is placed on top of the grip. When the zipper is closed - the cover fits securely and will not twist or turn. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; These pads are NOT for use on traditional U shaped walkers which require a pad that is open at BOTH ends. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The cover is a chloroprene rubber with a nylon surface, similar to wet suit material. Inside is open cell foam and a polyurethane solid GEL. It is referred to as a SOLID GEL and will not leak out. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Gel Ovations  products incorporate a latex-free, solid GEL and have a durable neoprene nylon surface, which is soft, easy to clean, and highly efficient at distributing pressure. They protect bony prominences and reduce abrasions, shear, and harmful pressure-related problems. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Do NOT put pads/covers in a washing machine.&lt;br&gt; Do NOT submerge them in water or agitate.&lt;br&gt; Do NOT put in clothes dryer. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; With HEATED DRYING turned OFF, you may wash them in the top rack of an automatic dishwasher. Alternatively, wipe the surface with any normal household soap or cleaning solution that is not irritating and to which you are not allergic.&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt;        &lt;P STYLE="margin-left: 5px; <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6613</CatalogID><ProductID>MST2096</ProductID><ProductName>Recliner Riser</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3365</CategoryID><CategoryName>Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids</CategoryName></Category><Category><CategoryID>3389</CategoryID><CategoryName>Coupons, Overstock and Sale items.</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>39.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>34.95</SalePrice><OnSale>1</OnSale><Stock>10</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>8/23/2011</DateCreated><Description>Helps make standing or sitting easier.</Description><ExtendedDescription>The &lt;b&gt;Recliner Risers&lt;/b&gt; attach quickly and easily to the wooden base of your favorite recliner. When you stand from the typical recliner, it tilts forward, dropping the arms and seat of an already low chair by 3 - 4 inches. Simply raising the chair by 5 or 6 inches, necessary for independent standing, makes it dangerously unstable. Stander has developed a safe and easy solution! &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; When Recliner Risers are installed, they raise a chair 1 ¾ inches and limit the forward tilt allowing an additional 3 - 4 inches of lift. The 4 - 6 total inches of extra support gives a weakened person a biomechanical advantage and enables them to stand on their own.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The patented design raises your effective seat height 4 - 6 inches while only raising your chair 1 ¾ inches. The Recliner Riser helps give your chair a lift.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a href="/assets/images/pdf/mst2096-recliner-riser-instructions.pdf " target="_blank"&gt;Recliner Risers Instructions&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt; The Safety Bed Rail works as a side rail for preventing falls as well as a support bar for getting out of bed. The collapsible Safety Bed Rail pivots down the side of the bed to help the user get out of bed.  Included is a dual safety strap that secures the bed rail to the bed frame.  &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The easy yet sturdy design allows you install the rail within minutes with only 4 bolts and an Alan wrench. <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6627</CatalogID><ProductID>CHP430</ProductID><ProductName>SuperPole System</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3365</CategoryID><CategoryName>Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>179.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>0.00</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>98</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>11/5/2011</DateCreated><Description>Secure and safe grab bar to aid in standing.</Description><ExtendedDescription>&lt;b&gt;Health Craft Super Pole System&lt;/b&gt; is floor to ceiling grab bar that has a high quality gripping surface that is easy to hold onto. This award winning modular support system is ideal for people with balance issues and for people needing mobility support. This grab bar provides support and balance assistance to those who need extra help transitioning from a seated position to a standing position. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;  SuperPole is a secure structure that is easy to install and easy to relocate - no drilling, no screws. It can be installed in minutes between a floor and ceiling and is held by a jackscrew expansion. The screw expands the pole to create enough tension between the floor and ceiling to hold the pole securely. Rubber pads on the ceiling plate and the floor plate hold the transfer pole in place and prevent marring of the ceiling or floor. Installs easily with no structural reinforcements needed. Foam hand grip provides a comfortable gripping surface, particularly useful for those with limited hand strength. Installs anywhere there is a floor and ceiling, placing transfer support directly where it is needed. Use it beside a bed, bath, toilet or chair. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Note: The SuperPole System should only be installed between floors and ceilings of solid construction or injury may result. The SuperPole System should not be installed on loose floor coverings, in rooms with radiant ceiling heating, in mobile homes, or in suspended or angled ceilings. Recommended weight limits are 300lbs. All designs and specifications subject to change without notice. Made in Canada © 2007.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a href="/assets/images/pdf/SuperPole-product-information.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;SuperPole Product Information&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a href="/assets/images/pdf/DC100-SuperPole-System-Instructions.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;SuperPole Assembly Instructions&lt;/a&gt;&lt;!-- product-specs.html starts --&gt;        &lt;P STYLE="margin-left: 5px; margin-right: 30px"&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"&gt;                &lt;h4&gt;SuperPole System Specifications:&lt;/h4&gt;        &lt;/FONT&gt;        &lt;/P&gt;        &lt;TABLE CELLSPACING="2" CELLPADDING="2" BORDER="0"&gt;                &lt;TR VALIGN="TOP"&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;IMG WIDTH="14" SRC="/assets/uploaded/spacer.gif" HEIGHT="12" BORDER="0"&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;&lt;B&gt;Material: .&lt;/B&gt;&lt;/FONT&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;                &lt;TD&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;Heavy duty steel 1.5 inch diameter, 90 inches long.&lt;/FONT&gt;&lt;/TD&gt; <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6628</CatalogID><ProductID>CHP431</ProductID><ProductName>SuperPole System with SuperBar</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3365</CategoryID><CategoryName>Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>263.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>0.00</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>98</Stock><StockAlert>0</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>11/5/2011</DateCreated><Description>Provides complete support for standing, stepping or transferring.</Description><ExtendedDescription>The &lt;b&gt;Health Craft Super Pole with Super Bar System&lt;/b&gt; is a floor-to-ceiling grab bar with a 16 inch horizontal center extension that can pivot in narrow areas such as between bed and wall, narrow hallways, etc. The Super Bar unlocks and pivots freely to move with you step by step. This horizontal security bar locks every 45 degrees for stability during standing and sitting transfers. The SuperBar automatically locks when released preventing forward or lateral falls and provides full support when making two or three step transfers. The SuperBar offers extra help transitioning from a seated position to a standing position. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; The SuperPole is a vertical grab bar installed between the floor and ceiling. This award winning modular support system was designed for those requiring assistance with standing, transferring, or moving in bed. Rubber pads on the ceiling plate and the floor plate hold the transfer pole in place and prevent marring of the ceiling or floor. Installs easily with no structural reinforcements needed. Foam hand grip provides a comfortable gripping surface, particularly useful for those with limited hand strength. Installs anywhere there is a floor and ceiling of solid construction, placing transfer support directly where it is needed. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt; Use the SuperPole with SuperBar attachment beside a bed, bath, toilet or chair. This transfer aid is more compact than a walker and ideal for use in small restricted areas such as washrooms. Useful for pivot transfers in narrow areas such as between bed and wall, narrow hallways, etc. This transfer pole and grab bar allows weight shifting, moving, standing, leaving or getting into bed, or transferring to a wheelchair, walker or bedside commode. In a shower, the Super Pole with Super Bar provides complete support for stepping over the tub wall without reaching for wall bars. The SuperBar can pivot away from shower curtains, allowing them to fully close during a shower. For toilet transfers, the SuperBar permits pulling up to standing and provides leaning support while managing clothing. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;center&gt;&lt;iframe width="480" height="360" src="http://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/wHiPZ___25Q?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;&lt;/center&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Please note: The SuperPole System should only be installed between floors and ceilings of solid construction or injury may result. Should not be installed on loose floor coverings, in rooms with radiant ceiling heating, in mobile homes or in suspended or angled ceilings.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a href="/assets/images/pdf/SuperPole-product-information.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;SuperPole Product Information&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a href="/assets/images/pdf/DC100-SuperPole-System-Instructions.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;SuperPole Assembly Instructions&lt;/a&gt; <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"><soap:Body><getProductResponse xmlns="http://3dcart.com/"><getProductResult><GetProductDetailsResponse xmlns=""><Product><CatalogID>6632</CatalogID><ProductID>CHP410</ProductID><ProductName>HealthCraft Smart Rail System Bed Rail</ProductName><Categories><Category><CategoryID>3365</CategoryID><CategoryName>Sitting, Standing and Transfer Aids</CategoryName></Category></Categories><Mfgid></Mfgid><Manufacturer></Manufacturer><Distributor></Distributor><Cost>0.00</Cost><Price>119.95</Price><RetailPrice>0</RetailPrice><SalePrice>0.00</SalePrice><OnSale>0</OnSale><Stock>98</Stock><StockAlert>5</StockAlert><Weight>0.00</Weight><Width>0.00</Width><Height>0.00</Height><Depth>0.00</Depth><MinimumOrder>1</MinimumOrder><MaximumOrder>0</MaximumOrder><DateCreated>1/9/2012</DateCreated><Description>The bed rail that swings open!</Description><ExtendedDescription>Unlike fixed bed rails, the &lt;b&gt;Health Craft Smart Rail System Bed Rail&lt;/b&gt; unlocks and swings open to provide exceptional support when standing or sitting. For many, getting in and out of bed can be a challenge.  The Smart-Rail can help! In the locked position, the Smart-Rail helps with in-bed positioning and is height adjustable to accommodate virtually any mattress thickness. Quickly installs by sliding the low profile frame between the box spring and mattress and securing with the safety strap.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The Health Craft Smart Rail System Bed Rail is a safety bed rail that unlocks and pivots outward to provide better standing support for transferring into and out of bed. This innovative bed rail provides a great solution for those needing moderate help with bed transfers.  Unlike many other bed rails, the Smart-Rail moves with you to provide dependable support when getting into or out of bed, without stretching or twisting. The Smart Rail System Bed Rail attaches to standard beds, not hospital beds or futons. It is constructed of strong tubular steel and is easily installed by inserting the support frame between the box spring and mattress. The included safety straps secure bed rail. It is simple to unlock by lifting handle. The Smart Rail System Bed Rail support frame measures 32 x 21.25 inches and is rigid tubular steel construction. Traction Grips prevent the Smart-Rail from slipping while in use. The height adjustable Support Rail measures 31.5 high x 16.5 inches wide, and 0.875 inch diameter strong tubular steel construction. Grey rubber cane tips prevent slipping and protect floor. The Smart Rail Grip measures 1.25 inch diameter and has a grey deluxe foam grip that does not contain latex.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;center&gt;&lt;iframe width="480" height="360" src="http://www.youtube-nocookie.com/embed/38E5KJXvMNk?rel=0" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen&gt;&lt;/iframe&gt;&lt;/center&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;b&gt;Note:&lt;/b&gt; This safety bed rail is intended for moderate vertical weight bearing on rail only. Do not use if lateral or side ward support is needed. Avoid rail latch unlocking by ensuring that rail is at least 2 inches off floor when rail is in locked position. Soft type box spring beds can compress downward under load allowing support frame to move down, and rail to become unlatched. Do not use on wet or slippery floors. Do not use with electric or hospital style beds. Both supplied straps must be installed for secure operation. Product intended for moderate assist with sitting up and standing only.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a href="/assets/images/pdf/product-note-smart-rail.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;Smart Rail System Bed Rail Product Information&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;a href="/assets/images/pdf/DC103-instructions-smart-rail.pdf" target="_blank"&gt;Smart Rail System Bed Rail Assembly Instructions&lt;/a&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;h4&gt;Smart-Rail System Bed Rail Specifications:&lt;/h4&gt;&lt;ul&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;b&gt;Important Note:&lt;/b&gt; this bed rail will not work on hospital beds or futons.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;b&gt;Measurement under the mattress:&lt;/b&gt; 23 inches.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;b&gt;Top of Rail from floor measures:&lt;/b&gt; 30 inches.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;b&gt;Support Rail Measurements:&lt;/b&gt; 31.5 inches high, 16.5 inches wide, frame 32 x 21.25 inches. &lt;li&gt;&lt;b&gt;Weight Capacity:&lt;/b&gt; 250 pounds.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;li&gt;&lt;b&gt;Smart-Rail Leg Extender also available:&lt;/b&gt; Increases rail height range to 31.5 - 34.5 inches. Sold separately.&lt;/li&gt;&lt;/ul&gt;</ExtendedDescription><Keywords>smart rail system bed rail, smart-rail, bed assist rail, safety bed rail, bed transfers, transfer aid, bed mobility, bed rail, Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions distribute a point pressure over a wide area thereby reducing the pressure per square inch and decreasing pressure when sitting in a wheelchair. &lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;This proprietary silicone polymer was designed to mimic the same physical characteristics as human fat tissue to reduce pressure, impact and vibration.  Medical grade silicone gel won't rot or dry out, will not flow or leak if cut or punctured. Synergel Dimensions Gel Cushions are very durable and made in USA. Unlike other gel pads, these gel cushions will not retain heat and are odorless. These arm pads are made of medical grade silicone gel. This shock-absorbing 1.5 inch thick gel armrest pad is ideal for those who want a softer and safer way to rest their arms and prevent elbow pressure sores.  A cushioned armrest is perfect for wheelchair, power chair or scooter users to rest their arms on while riding.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The Gel Armrest Pad has a a wooden base and plastic base guard which provides a stabilizing surface for the gel pad. The neoprene nylon cover can be easily washed. The gel pad will not dry, rot or leak if punctured. The gel pad bolts directly to the armrest tubing and hardware is included. Sizes and lengths are available for a desk length armrest or full length armrest. The hardware that is provided for the gel armrest pad is two bolts and washers. The ergonomic design allows the person pushing to place their hands in a variety of positions. When using both hands, the Push Bar for Wheelchairs transfers power directly to the chair with less effort. This helps to make maneuvering steep ramps, inclines, uneven surfaces, soft ground, or carpets much easier.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;Children and the elderly will find that a wheelchair equipped with the Push Bar for Wheelchairs is much easier to push and control. Very tall people and people with lower back pain will be able to stand straighter when pushing a wheelchair with the Push Bar for Wheelchairs.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The Push Bar for Wheelchairs is available in two sizes to fit wheelchairs with handlebars from 12 to 19 inches or 17 to 26 inches apart. The kit consists of 2 L-shaped elbows and an adjustable center bar. The L-shaped elbows attach permanently to the handles of a manual wheelchair. The expandable center bar slips over the upright portion of the L-shaped elbow and is secured with a push pin. The center bar is quickly and easily removed from the L-shaped handles to allow the wheelchair to be stored or transported.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;&lt;!-- product-specs.html begins --&gt;&lt;P&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;&lt;h4&gt;Push Bar for Wheelchairs Specifications:&lt;/h4&gt;&lt;/FONT&gt;&lt;/P&gt;&lt;TABLE CELLSPACING="2" CELLPADDING="2" BORDER="0"&gt;&lt;TR VALIGN="TOP"&gt;&lt;TD&gt;&lt;IMG WIDTH="24" SRC="/assets/images/spacer.gif" HEIGHT="12" BORDER="0"&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;&lt;TD&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;&lt;B&gt;Includes:&lt;/B&gt;&lt;/FONT&gt;&lt;/TD&gt;&lt;TD&gt;&lt;FONT FACE="Arial, Verdana, Helvetica, sans-serif" SIZE="2"&gt;2 L-shaped elbows with attaching bolts and nuts, adjustable&lt;br&gt; It fits a wide variety of armrest sizes including deluxe scooter armrests. Two straps also secure the bottom of the bag to the frame of the chair. These straps prevent the scooter bag from swinging outward.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The Scooter Saddle Bag Large is ideal for carrying books, documents, homework, binders and other personal papers and is a great mid-sized armrest wheelchair pouch for mid-wheel drive scooters. The size of this armrest bag will not interfere with mid-wheel drive scooter tires.&lt;br&gt;&lt;br&gt;The Scooter Saddle Bag Large has 7 storage areas: a large main compartment with a small inside pocket and flap closure, a front zippered pocket, front mesh pocket, 2 side pockets and a rear pocket.
